name: @proompteng/agentctl
description: CLI for managing Agents via Kubernetes or Jangar gRPC

scripts.build: bun run --filter @proompteng/codex build && bun run sync:proto && bun build src/index.ts --target node --outfile dist/agentctl.js && bun run scripts/add-shebang.ts dist/agentctl.js
scripts.build:bin: bun run --filter @proompteng/codex build && bun run sync:proto && bun run scripts/build-binaries.ts
scripts.build:bins: bun run --filter @proompteng/codex build && bun run sync:proto && bun run scripts/build-binaries.ts --all
scripts.build:release: bun run --filter @proompteng/codex build && bun run sync:proto && bun run scripts/build-release.ts
scripts.prepack: bun run build && bun run build:bins
